mapper.sql: FROM catalog_deploy cat INNER JOIN k8s k8s ON cat.k8s_id = k8s.k8s_id
mapper.select: /* CatalogDeployMapper.selectCatalogDeployHistoryList */ SELECT catalog_deploy_history_id ,catalog_deploy_id ,catalog_deploy_yaml ,deploy_result ,deploy_desc ,deploy_user_id ,deploy_user_name ,deploy_date ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY catalog_deploy_history_id) AS rownum FROM catalog_deploy_history WHERE catalog_deploy_id = #{catalogDeployId} ORDER BY catalog_deploy_history_id DESC
